title: Tutorial
body:
Hello! Press "z" to go to the next dialogue line and/or to choose an option.
Hold "x" to make text scroll faster.
Use the arrow keys to move around.
Use the "Up" and "Down" arrow keys to browse through the options.
Press "e" to interact with appliances and customers!
Good luck! << set $c1S to false >>  << set $c2S to false >> << set $c3S to false >>

title: Customer1
body:
One coffee please!
[[ (Give coffee) |giveCoffee1]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks1]]

title: makeDrinks
body:
Would you like to make a drink?
[[ Yes |drinkChoices]] [[ No |No]]

title: makePastries
body:
Would you like to make a pastry?
[[ Yes |pastryChoices]] [[ No |No]]

title: Customer3
body:
Hi!
Just a coffee for me!
[[ (Give coffee) |giveCoffee3]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks3]]

title: Customer2
body:
Hi!
I would like a cake please!
[[ (Give cake) |giveCake2]] [[ Sure thing! |thanks2]]

title: cakeMade
body:
<<Cake>>
You made cake!  +1 cake

title: pastryChoices
body:
What pastry would you like to make?
[[ Cake |cakeMade]] [[ Never mind |No]]

title: coffeeMade
body:
<<Coffee>>  
You made coffee!    +1 coffee

title: drinkChoices
body:
What drink would you like to make?
[[ Coffee |coffeeMade]] [[ Never mind |No]]

title: giveCake2
body:
<<if $cake == true>> 
<<removeCake>>
<< set $c2S to true >>
Thank you for the cake! 
<<else>>
It seems like you didn't bring any cake with you.
<<endif>>

title: thanks3
body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

title: thanks2
body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

title: giveCoffee3
body:
<<if $coffee == true>> 
<<removeCoffee>>
<< set $c3S to true >>
Thank you for the coffee!   
<<else>>
It seems like you didn't bring any coffee with you.
<<endif>>

title: thanks1
body: Once you make it, please bring it to me! Thank you!

title: giveCoffee1
body:
<<if $coffee == true>> 
<<removeCoffee>>
<< set $c1S to true >>
Thank you for the coffee!  
<<else>>
It seems like you didn't bring any coffee with you.
<<endif>>

title: No
body: Press "z" to exit.

title: week1Summary
body:
I was able to complete this week.
I wonder if I can save this cafe.
[[ Go to next week |week2Load]]

body:
Fast Forwarding to next week...
<<Week2>>
